EB.msg: Delicia can't we#just run away#together? nobody#will find us here*??*it's nice#and quiet.*No vince#i'm sorry#we can't.#it's just too#dangerous*how much#longer do we#have to#wait?*it's going to#be tough but#i'll make it#worthwile#i promise!*#

sprite.msg: the end of the world party#be there or be square!
